author: john swensen
comment: It always asks to pair with phone by opening handheld app and when you do it still doesn't sync.

reply.author: SamSoft
reply.content:
So sorry if our app doesn't works fine in your phone/watch, for try to fix it, tell us:

-what watch do you have?
-do you have the last version of android wear app?
-do you try to restart your mobile and your watch (both)?
-do you try to reinstall it?
-describe your problem step by step

We wait your answer, thx for your feedback and best regards

title: Barely works

author: phil boyer
comment: Do not download this app after I downloaded it my Ui stopped working until I deleted it.My phone is 6 edge

reply.author: SamSoft
reply.content: Phill we so sorry but I have too the s6 edge plus and don't trashed :S we like to know what happened with your error for fix our watchface, please send us the error report or send us a mail with the details of your error on contacto@samsoft.es , sorry and regards

title: Dodgy app

reply.author: SamSoft
reply.content: Thanks so much we are very happy with your opinion of our watchface, we are working now on a new app (with wear support too) when we will finish it(soon), we take our watchfaces for make new free features :)
